Class Armor

java.lang.Object
gamePackages.items.Item
gamePackages.items.Armor
public class Armor extends Item
Represents an armor item in the game. The `Armor` class extends the base `Item` class and adds functionality specific to armor, such as providing a damage reduction statistic (`armor_stat`).

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Armor

      public Armor(String name, float posX, float posY, String spritePath, float armor_stat)
      Constructs an `Armor` item with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the armor item.
      posX - The X-coordinate of the armor's position.
      posY - The Y-coordinate of the armor's position.
      spritePath - The file path to the sprite texture for the armor.
      armor_stat - The damage reduction value provided by the armor.

  • Method Details

    • getArmorStat

      public float getArmorStat()
      Gets the armor statistic of the item.
      Returns:
      The armor stat, representing the damage reduction value.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of the item.
      Specified by:
      getType in class Item
      Returns:
      A string representing the type of the item, which is `"armor"`.

    • use

      public void use(Player player) throws Exception
      Applies the armor's effect to the specified player.
      Specified by:
      use in class Item
      Parameters:
      player - The player on whom the armor is used.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while applying the armor's effect. This method toggles the player's damage reduction. If the player currently has no damage reduction, the armor's stat is applied. If the player already has damage reduction, it is reset to zero.
